name: Super unfair multiball Pong (bevy-jam#1)
description:
Source code is here: https://github.com/neosam/bevy-jam-1

Beat the AI at this super action pong multiball sports game!   It has an unfair advantage since its paddle is much bigger but its totally dumb.  Use the W and S buttons to move your paddle and try to score 10 points before the AI does.

A ball gets faster after each bounce on a paddle.  The angle after a ball bounces is based on where the ball touches the paddle.  On the center, it will go straight back and on the edge it will have a 45 degree angle.
